atbat.des: Luis Castillo singles on a ground ball to center fielder Melky Cabrera.

pitch.cc: Mike Minor went back to the four-seam fastball even though Luis Castillo hit for a single last time up.
Dangerous count for Mike Minor; Luis Castillo is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .654 OPS against them and .616 against everything else.
Mike Minor has thrown 75 pitches; he holds opposing hitters to a .231 average in the first 75 pitches and .250 after that.

atbat.des: David Wright walks. Luis Castillo to 2nd.
Carlos Beltran walks. Luis Castillo to 3rd. David Wright to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Mike Minor went back to the four-seam fastball even though Carlos Beltran hit for a double last time up.

atbat.des: Jeff Francoeur out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Melky Cabrera. Luis Castillo scores.

pitch.cc: Mike Minor went back to the four-seam fastball even though Jeff Francoeur hit for a single last time up.
Mike Minor shows faith in David Ross by throwing the curveball in the dirt.

atbat.des: Ike Davis walks. David Wright to 3rd. Carlos Beltran to 2nd.
Henry Blanco out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Melky Cabrera. David Wright scores.

pitch.cc: Mike Minor shows faith in David Ross by throwing the curveball in the dirt.

atbat.des: Chris Carter grounds out, second baseman Omar Infante to first baseman Derrek Lee.

pitch.cc: Mike Minor went back to the four-seam fastball even though Chris Carter hit for a single last time up.
Mike Minor is getting squeezed this inning by home plate ump Alfonso Marquez.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Nate McLouth replaces Mike Minor.

atbat.des: Omar Infante reaches on force attempt, fielding error by second baseman Luis Castillo. Nate McLouth to 3rd.

pitch.cc: Jon Niese went back to the cutter even though Omar Infante hit for a single last time up.
Jon Niese has thrown 75 pitches; he holds opposing hitters to a .248 average in the first 75 pitches and .301 after that.

atbat.des: Jason Heyward doubles (25) on a line drive to center fielder Carlos Beltran. Nate McLouth scores. Omar Infante scores.
Martin Prado singles on a line drive to right fielder Jeff Francoeur. Jason Heyward to 3rd.

pitch.cc: Jon Niese went back to the cutter even though Martin Prado hit for a double last time up.
Jon Niese had Martin Prado down 0-2 but could not put him away.

atbat.des: Derrek Lee walks. Martin Prado to 2nd.

Alex Gonzalez singles on a fly ball to right fielder Jeff Francoeur. Jason Heyward scores. Martin Prado out at home on the throw, right fielder Jeff Francoeur to catcher Henry Blanco. Derrek Lee to 3rd.
Melky Cabrera walks. Alex Gonzalez to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Jon Niese went back to the cutter even though Melky Cabrera hit for a single last time up.
Jon Niese is trying to tie up Melky Cabrera with fastballs inside, where Melky Cabrera hits .288.
Jon Niese has thrown 100 pitches; he holds opposing hitters to a .264 average in the first 100 pitches and .208 after that.

atbat.des: David Ross hits a grand slam (2) to left field. Derrek Lee scores. Alex Gonzalez scores. Melky Cabrera scores.

pitch.cc: Jon Niese went back to the cutter even though David Ross hit for a triple last time up.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Elmer Dessens replaces Jon Niese, batting 9th.

atbat.des: Nate McLouth grounds out softly, second baseman Luis Castillo to first baseman Ike Davis.

pitch.cc: Elmer Dessens is getting a generous strike zone this inning from home plate ump Alfonso Marquez.
